casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arris James HINTON. No. 113P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2006. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Raleigh, for Arris James Hinton.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of March 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2006."
